text: José Monteiro de Macedo (born 2 June 1982) is a Bissau-Guinean-Swedish international football player. His main position on the pitch is central defender. ==Personal life== Monteiro has also acquired Swedish citizenship. ==References== ==External links== * * * * Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:People from Algiers Category:Bissau-Guinean footballers Category:Guinea-Bissau international footballers Category:Allsvenskan players Category:Hammarby Talang FF players Category:Hammarby Fotboll players Category:Bissau-Guinean expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Sweden Category:People with acquired Swedish citizenship Category:Värmdö IF players Category:Association football central defenders
title: José Monteiro (footballer)
